overview: Dilip Badwe has helped several companies manage complex & diverse international marketing initiatives. For the last 38 years he has assisted various international organizations with marketing as well as other strategic business areas. Dilip developed his core competency - international marketing while working for 18 years in various senior positions with Tata International Ltd., where he was responsible for marketing products, services and also the projects across the five continents. He brings a deep understanding of the complexities involved in marketing in varied multicultural environments.
